nodes.text: Admiral Bornet Lorax was a Human male who served the Galactic Empire during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Lorax was a supporter of Governor Zerex, of the planet Ord Adinorr. When Zerex was promoted to become the moff of the Meridian sector, Lorax attended a celebratory party that Zerex held in his mansion on Ord Adinorr.
